basic_info.description: Heather Here! I'm a US Army veteran and the creative mind behind crafting awesome full-stack applications that dance with React, Node.js, JavaScript, and MUI. I've got a knack for databases too, from PostgreSQL and MySQL to MongoDB. Right now, I'm having a blast whipping up some exciting applications with the magic of Python and the charm of PHP! Let's make coding an adventure!

projects.title: BiteShare
projects.description: Introducing BiteShare, your go-to mobile marvel for hassle-free bill-splitting adventures with friends! With BiteShare at your fingertips, creating a meal session is a breeze â€“ just a few taps and you're ready to roll! ðŸŽ‰ Invite your pals to join the gastronomic journey, and watch as the magic unfolds. Splitting the bill has never been this painless! But wait, there's more! ðŸŒŸ Explore your friends' culinary escapades and leave your mark with comments and reactions that'll have you sharing laughs and tastes. It's not just an app; it's a vibrant social hub! BiteShare transforms dining out into a lively, interactive experience that weaves connections and builds a true sense of community. Get ready to savor the moment and share the joy!

projects.title: Atelier
projects.description: We redesigned our client's retail portal, modernizing the site and addressing all functionality requests. I developed the Ratings and Reviews module, using React to implement the front-end service and styled-components to match the UI wireframes.

projects.title: Back-end @ Atelier
projects.description: Revamped the back-end server with microservices for scalability, designing and building the Product Overview API. Migrated 35+ million records from legacy database to PostgreSQL, deploying the server with Docker and NGINX on AWS EC2 for horizontal scaling. Boosted RPS from 1000 to 6000 with low latency and 0% error rate, ensuring a seamless user experience.
